overview.en: With the help of blockchain and interactive technologies, Circus brings closer interactions with audiences to exhibitions and concert events, opening a wide new perspective on entertainment and arts industry. Delivering everyone more enjoyment and happiness. Pure happiness is what our core is made.
overview.zh: Circus將透過區塊鏈及互動科技讓展覽與演唱會等活動能與觀眾更貼近，打開娛樂及知性行業的新面貌，傳達更多的幸福與快樂給每一個人，不需要被轉達才是純粹的快樂！
